data.title: Decentralized Cleanup Network (DeCleanup Network)
data.description:
# Table of Contents
- About Us: DeCleanup Network
- Who Are We?
- Establishing Initial Partnerships
- How It Works in V1
- What the dApp V2 Will Look Like
- Plans to Expand the Network and Increase Cleanup Actions
- Challenges Solved by DeCleanup Network

# About Us: DeCleanup Network
DeCleanup Network is a global community of impactful action, with a mission to expand real-world impact and motivate individuals and communities to engage in environmental cleanups. Our focus goes beyond technology - we are about creating measurable, positive change in the environment while fostering community growth. We aim to achieve realistic Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) such as:
- Expanding our community to onboard 1,000+ active participants globally within the next year.
- Establishing 15+ partnerships with organizations, projects, and networks to amplify our outreach.
- Facilitating and verifying 5,000+ cleanups globally within a year, contributing to measurable environmental impact.
- Increasing wallet activations and dApp usage by 200% to drive engagement and impact tokenization.

While our decentralized application (dApp) is a critical tool, it serves as a means to achieve our broader goals: activating global and local communities, promoting environmental stewardship, and scaling cleanup actions through gamified and incentivized systems.

# Who Are We?
DeCleanup Network is a global community dedicated to environmental cleanups and measurable impact.

**What We Do:**
- Expand environmental impact through global and local cleanup efforts.
- Motivate and incentivize cleanup actions with tokenized rewards and gamification.
- Foster partnerships with like-minded organizations to amplify our reach.

**[DeCleanup Rewards](https://decleanup.net):**
Our decentralized application (dApp), V1 is built on Arbitrum, is designed to:
- Tokenize real-world impact from cleanup efforts.
- Incentivize environmental actions through DeFi mechanics.

![image](https://i.ibb.co/VYhQ05j/DCUSlide6.jpg)

# Establishing Initial Partnerships
Initial community outreach was established by partnership proposals with key networks such as GreenPill Network and ReFi DAO. [ReFi](https://x.com/refiphangan/status/1837797388368728419?s=61) and GreenPill Phangan, in particular, are active in the [Monthly Earth Day](https://x.com/highlyartistic/status/1837668300425429023?s=61) movement. 

The other ReFi node that is organizing cleanups is [ReFi Tulum](https://x.com/refitulum/status/1838290711961112606?s=61).

Additional partnerships with [Aqua Purge web3](https://x.com/aquapurgeweb3/status/1822565379593449715?s=61) have furthered our global reach. These communities organize regular cleanups and were the first we have targeted. The Japanese community that joined the Network, [HEMJapan](https://x.com/hemjapan?s=21), impressed us with 12 new wallets applied with the proofs after their recent Monthly Earth Day [cleanup](https://x.com/hemjapan/status/1838096871035928649?s=61).

Moreover, we are establishing partnerships with like-minded projects. For example, DeCleanup and [Cleanify](https://x.com/cleanify_vet?s=21) have a collaborative strategy to promote each other, motivating both communities to organize more cleanups and providing additional incentives for them.

DeCleanup Network has established activity in a new location - Nigeria, Nsukka, where we supported a campaign organized by Unplogging Nigeria, UNN community. The campaign called Pesathon provides environmental education for students of UNN for two weeks, encouraging them to clean up the campus and nature around it, and submit photos to our dApp. The campaign included a bounty on Impact Miner by [Atlantis](https://www.atlantisp2p.com/), where we increased rewards for winners and provided $120 USDGLO of additional funding.

During Devcon in Bangkok in November, we [cleaned up](https://x.com/DeCleanupNet/status/1857724107447742821) the sidewalks nearby the main venue and celebrated with a Pizza DAO-sponsored afterparty! 

# How It Works In V1?
Participants submit Proof of Impact (PoI) data for cleanup activities via the DeCleanup dApp. These submissions are verified and converted into dynamic Impact Products (dIPs), assets that evolve with user contributions. Each dIP grows in Impact Value (IV), levels, and DCU Points (which will be converted into $DCU Tokens during the Token Generation Event at V2 launch). The platform ensures an incentivized and gamified system for global environmental impact, where every action is measurable and rewarding.

![How It Works](https://i.ibb.co/cLXr4TG/DCUSlide5.jpg)

The dynamic Impact Products have common traits that remain consistent with each NFT upgrade:
- **Category**: Cleanup Impact NFT
- **Type**: Dynamic
- **Impact**: Environmental

Dynamic traits grow every three cleanups:
- **Rarity**: Common (1-3 cleanups), Rare (4-6 cleanups), Legendary (7-9 cleanups), Unique (10 cleanups)
- **Level**: Newbie (1-3 cleanups), Pro (4-6 cleanups), Hero (7-9 cleanups), Guardian (10 cleanups)

Dynamic traits grow with every cleanup done:
- **Impact Value**: 1 (first cleanup) to 10 (last cleanup)
- **DCU Points**: 10 (first cleanup) to 100 (last cleanup)

While the first two categories of traits determine the general information required for classification on the Impact Marketplace, the last categories are dynamic traits determining rewards via DeFi utility and contributing to the user’s IRL impact rank.

# What The dApp V2 Will Look Like?
![dApp V2 Preview](https://i.ibb.co/Gcx4FjB/userflow.jpg)

V2 aims to decentralize the process further and provide users with more tools to participate in and manage environmental impact. In V2, we are enhancing the platform to include:
- Open-source Development: Encouraging global contributions.
- Decentralized Verification: Replacing admin-based processes with community voting and verification.
- Multi-chain Compatibility: Expanding reach and improving scalability.
- Enhanced UX/UI: Creating a seamless and intuitive user experience.
- New Features:
  1. Referral systems.
  2. Leaderboards and streak tracking.
  3. Collaborative cleanups (Impact Circles).
  4. Comprehensive dashboard.
- $DCU Utility Token: Introducing staking, rewards, and new functionalities.

![New Features](https://i.ibb.co/MN5CJ6v/DCUSlide13.jpg)

# Plans to Expand the Network and Increase Cleanup Actions
DeCleanup Network has a robust strategy to scale its global reach and significantly increase the number of cleanups worldwide:
- **Community Activation**:
  - Launch targeted campaigns in urban and rural areas to encourage community-driven cleanups.
  - Host regional challenges and offer rewards for top-performing areas.
- **Partnerships**:
  - Collaborate with educational institutions to promote environmental awareness and organize student-led cleanups.
  - Partner with corporate social responsibility (CSR) programs to drive employee engagement in cleanup efforts.
- **Ambassador Program**:
  - Recruit passionate individuals as ambassadors to promote cleanups in their regions.
  - Provide ambassadors with resources, training, and exclusive rewards to help organize events and grow the network.
  - Track ambassador-led initiatives to ensure measurable impact and provide recognition for their contributions.
- **Digital Outreach**:
  - Expand our social media presence to connect with eco-conscious individuals and groups.
  - Gamify participation further and reward other tasks like recruiting members or writing detailed cleanup reports.
- **Scaling Impact Circles**:
  - Develop collaborative frameworks for Impact Circles to increase group-based cleanup efforts.
  - Provide tools and resources for local leaders to organize and report on community cleanups effectively.

# Challenges Could Be Solved by DeCleanup Network
- Provides scalable incentives for individuals and communities to engage in cleanup activities.
- Ensures transparency and accountability with decentralized verification of real-world impacts.
- Bridges the gap between grassroots sustainability efforts and measurable, tokenized rewards.

More about DeCleanup Network: [LinkTree](https://linktr.ee/DecentralizedCleanup)  
Public presentation: [Link](https://www.canva.com/design/DAGVOBMh688/ZpfF20KjPx09gMqjPTB-jA/view?utm_content=DAGVOBMh688&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=uniquelinks&utlId=h28476f714f)
data.problem: Environmental degradation continues to accelerate due to pollution, waste mismanagement, and ecosystem destruction. Current initiatives often lack scalable incentives, transparency, and measurable impact, making it challenging to sustain long-term engagement. Efforts are frequently fragmented, and communities lack the tools needed to track and prove their contributions.
data.solution:
DeCleanup tokenizes IRL impact of cleanups by providing a platform where participants document their actions and receive dynamic assets, which grow in value and evolve as they contribute more. This process transforms physical actions into digital assets, creating a verifiable record of impact and promoting transparency, accountability, and ongoing engagement.



Through gamification, leaderboard systems, staking opportunities, and a focus on community-driven impact, DeCleanup brings together individuals, NGOs, and communities in a global network committed to sustainability. When participating, users gather Impact Value and DCU points, build a transparent IRL Impact Rank, and get exposed to network of people with common goals. By merging environmental action with blockchain innovation, DeCleanup creates a measurable pathway to a cleaner, healthier planet.
data.missionSummary:
Our Mission
DeCleanup Network’s mission is to empower individuals, NGOs, and communities to take impactful environmental action by tokenizing real-world impact of cleanups and recording it onchain.
data.pathToTake: Want to grow through just grant funding

data.description:
### Basic Details

Decentralized Cleanup was born as GreenPill Phangan chapter’s initiative in Thailand. The idea was to reward local and global communities for their random or organized cleanup efforts. The demo version featured registration form with proof of cleanup and NFT certificate of participation built on Unlock Protocol. 

Today DeCleanup Network is a blockchain-based platform designed to incentivize and reward global environmental cleanup efforts through digital assets. By leveraging blockchain technology, DeCleanup creates a transparent and verifiable system for rewarding individuals and communities for their environmental contributions. Participants use a decentralized application (DApp) to document cleanups, submit evidence, and receive digital assets as rewards. This initiative aims to foster global participation in environmental stewardship, with plans to scale and integrate into broader blockchain ecosystems.

### What Has Been Done

#### DApp and Dynamic NFT Collection

![Screenshot of the Main Page](https://beige-defiant-spoonbill-537.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmWjckBnwWkidWtTQwR17TrQWoo9j3FX5LLwRg8s3n12cN)

To date, we have launched the dApp on the Arbitrum chain. You can visit the page [here](https://decleanup.net). We didn’t make official announcements yet as we are fixing last bugs and making sure all the steps of the process are working well.

The main feature of our rewards program is the collection of dynamic NFTs, themed around cleanup activities and designed to incentivize and reward participants for their environmental cleanup efforts. Each NFT reward can be upgraded (with 10 steps of progress) as users provide photos from different cleanup events.

The collection items have common traits that remain consistent with each NFT upgrade:
- **Category**: Cleanup NFT
- **Type**: Dynamic
- **Impact**: Environment

There are dynamic traits, which grow every three cleanups:
- **Rarity**: Common (1-3 cleanups), Rare (4-6 cleanups), Legendary (7-9 cleanups), Unique (10 cleanups)
- **Level**: Newbie (1-3 cleanups), Pro (4-6 cleanups), Hero (7-9 cleanups), Guardian (10 cleanups)

And dynamic traits which grow with every cleanup done:
- **Impact Value**: 1 (first cleanup) to 10 (last cleanup)
- **DCU Points**: 10 (first cleanup) to 100 (last cleanup)

While the first two categories of traits determine the general information required for this product’s classification on the Impact Marketplace, and also gives the ranking to the user, the last category are main dynamic traits, which will determine the value of the NFT on the Impact Marketplace in the future and user’s onchain rank. Read more on this topic in the article by EcoSynthesisX [here](https://mirror.xyz/ecosynthesisx.eth/zOdeuaeFfJUFScZZKu1OGF7cWCiRgUHQSGE-14cf8fo).

![Example of Traits](https://beige-defiant-spoonbill-537.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmfUA1PomqfsXPZod2oo79nrMq17xT1Rxo8EdWxwFFVHxM)

#### Establishing Initial Partnerships

We have also completed community outreach planned for the first stage. The conversation was recorded on [X space](https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1OwGWNjjQOqKQ), where we discussed the vision for DeCleanup Network development with partners around the world. There is also a detailed article on [Mirror.xyz](https://mirror.xyz/0x173D87dfa68aEB0E821C6021f5652B9C3a7556b4/ZzncKRu-Q-leEZkQ48Txm-NQRxG_hH3V3wyHaYUKfY).

We have established our first line of partners to drive our marketing campaign. Main partners include communities committed to organizing at least one cleanup a month, ideally on Monthly Earth Day, to support the environmental movement started by Crypto Whales NFT - [Highly Artistic](https://x.com/highlyartistic?s=21). These community leaders will receive a comprehensive guide on using the DeCleanup Rewards dApp and will get first-hand support necessary for the initial stage. They will then pass this knowledge to the next layer of users.

Our initial partners in this category, GreenPill Phangan and ReFi Phangan, are among the most active participants in the Monthly Earth Day movement and early adopters of the program. There is a significant need for cleanups in this region, as improperly disposed trash often ends up at burning sites, causing severe air pollution. You can see their latest cleanup report [here](https://x.com/refiphangan/status/1815683299542761801?s=61).

Another partner, [Aqua Purge web3](https://x.com/aquapurgeweb3?s=21), organized a significant three-location [cleanup in Kenya](https://x.com/decentracleanup/status/1813189876155883700?s=61) for Monthly Earth Day in July. They are planning to start community onboarding to DeCleanup rewards and other incentives from our partners.

Additionally, we have ReFi Tulum, who consistently support Monthly Earth Day and are eager to introduce their community to crypto incentives. Their latest cleanup report can be found [here](https://x.com/refitulum/status/1815469046550479276?s=61).

We also collaborate with projects that create various cleanup incentives. For example, DeCleanup and [Cleanify](https://x.com/cleanify_vet?s=21) have a collaborative strategy to promote each other, motivating both communities to organize more cleanups, and providing additional incentives for them.

### What Needs To Be Done

1. **Official Launch (TBA)**: The project begins with its initial launch on the Arbitrum chain, introducing first three levels of rewards to incentivize early participants.

2. **Communities Activation (22.11.2024)**: This phase focuses on finishing onboarding of partners onboard, including both leaders and participants, to establish a foundation for the network's growth.

3. **Marketing (Q1 2025)**: Marketing efforts aim to engage communities, drive participation, build partnerships, and promote key initiatives like Monthly Earth Day events.

4. **Expansion (Q2 2025)**: The platform eventually expands to multiple blockchain networks, increasing its reach and involving more global communities and partners.

5. **DeCleanup 2.0 (Q4 2025)**: This final phase involves the full rollout of the platform with all planned features, evaluating performance, refining strategies, and ensuring the project’s sustainability for long-term success.

### Conclusion

DeCleanup Network promotes environmental stewardship by incentivizing cleanup efforts through blockchain technology, fostering a global community of environmentally conscious individuals and organizations. By integrating with broader blockchain ecosystems, it enhances the overall impact and reach of blockchain technology for public goods.

data.title: Spring QF Round

questions.query: How should the success of your grant be measured?
questions.explanation:
1. **Environmental Impact**:
   - Amount of waste collected and removed from natural environments (e.g., rivers, beaches).
   - Number of successful cleanup events organized and executed.

2. **Community Engagement**:
   - Number of active participants using the DApp for documenting cleanups.
   - Growth in the global community and user base over time.
   - Levels of participant satisfaction and feedback.

3. **Reward Distribution**:
   - Number and value of $DCU tokens and NFTs distributed as rewards.
   - Progression and upgrades of dynamic NFTs based on user activities.

4. **Partnerships and Collaborations**:
   - Number of partnerships established with existing cleanup initiatives and environmental organizations.
   - Successful implementation of joint programs and campaigns.

5. **Verification Process**:
   - Efficiency and accuracy of automated verification tools.
   - Integration and effectiveness of third-party verification platforms.

6. **Scalability and Integration**:
   - Expansion into additional blockchain ecosystems.
   - Adoption rate and compatibility across multiple blockchain networks.

questions.query: What is the intended direct impact your project will have on the ecosystem?
questions.explanation:
1. **Reduction of Pollution**: By incentivizing regular cleanups, our project aims to significantly reduce pollution in rivers, beaches, and other natural environments, improving the overall health of these ecosystems.
2. **Increased Recycling**: Encouraging and rewarding recycling efforts will lead to more efficient waste management and reduced environmental footprint.
3. **Awareness and Education**: Raising awareness about environmental issues and educating participants on the importance of cleanup efforts and sustainable practices.
4. **Community Engagement**: Building a global community of environmentally conscious individuals and organizations, fostering a culture of collective responsibility and active participation in environmental stewardship.
5. **Sustainable Practices**: Promoting and supporting sustainable practices through continuous engagement and reward systems, leading to long-term positive changes in behavior and attitudes towards the environment.

questions.query: What is the long-term impact of your grant?
questions.explanation:
1. **Sustainable Environmental Stewardship**: Establishing a lasting framework for incentivized environmental cleanups, promoting ongoing efforts to maintain cleaner natural spaces.
2. **Global Reach and Integration**: Expanding the platform's reach and integrating it with broader blockchain ecosystems, making environmental cleanup efforts more accessible and rewarding worldwide.
3. **Technological Innovation**: Advancing the use of blockchain technology and automated verification tools in environmental initiatives, setting new standards for transparency and efficiency.
4. **Community Empowerment**: Empowering communities to take charge of their local environments through sustained engagement and rewards, fostering a global network of environmental advocates.
5. **Educational Legacy**: Creating a long-lasting educational impact by continuously raising awareness about environmental issues and the importance of sustainable practices.

questions.query: How will the grant funds be used?
questions.explanation:
The grant funds will be used as follows:

1. **Development (70%)**:
   - **Blockchain Infrastructure**: Build and enhance the DCU NFT and $DCU reward token systems.
   - **Decentralized Application (DApp)**: Develop, test, and refine the DApp for user-friendly documentation and reward distribution.
   - **Community Engagement**: Implement strategies to engage and grow the community.
   - **Marketing Campaigns**: Raise awareness and attract participants.
   - **Operational Logistics**: Support the pilot program and ensure smooth operations.

2. **Cleanup Operations (30%)**:
   - **Organizing Cleanups**: Facilitate and support monthly global cleanup events on Monthly Earth Day.
   - **Participant Support**: Provide resources and incentives for participants to engage in cleanup activities.

These funds will ensure the successful development and deployment of DeCleanUp, driving significant environmental impact and community growth.

questions.query: What is the timeframe for the work funded?
questions.explanation: About 3 months of activity, not including retroactive rewards for all the team members

questions.query: How will receiving a grant enable you to foster growth or innovation within the ecosystem?
questions.explanation:
Receiving a grant will enable DeCleanup to:

1. **Accelerate Development**: Speed up the creation of our blockchain infrastructure, DApp, and dynamic NFT reward system, plus development of automated verification system. 
2. **Scale Operations**: Reach more communities and organize larger, more frequent cleanup events globally.
3. **Advance Technology**: Invest in machine learning and image recognition for automated verification, improving transparency and efficiency.
4. **Form Partnerships**: Collaborate with established environmental organizations and other blockchain projects to amplify impact.
5. **Enhance Marketing**: Boost awareness, attract more participants, and build a stronger community.

data.text: So far, 50% of funds are in Decentralized Cleanup treasury wallets, the rest was used for sponsoring cleanup operations and starting of the development of NFT collection.
So far, this grant have helped us to design the art, develop dynamic NFT collection of rewards for cleanup, UX/IU design for dApp, and the basics of marketing program

data.title: Giveth Earth QF

questions.query: How should the success of your grant be measured?
questions.explanation:
The success of our grant can be measured through the following key performance indicators (KPIs):

1. Community Engagement: Number of new communities, NGOs, and startups onboarded and actively participating in cleanups.
2. Cleanup Events: Frequency and scale of organized cleanup events, especially on Monthly Earth Day.
3. Digital Rewards: Quantity and quality of dynamic NFTs issued as rewards for verified cleanups.
4. Environmental Impact: Quantifiable improvements in local environments, such as volume of waste collected and areas cleaned.
5. Platform Usage: Increase in DApp users and activity on the Arbitrum chain.
6. Social Media Reach: Growth in social media followers, engagement, and content reach related to DeCleanup activities.
7. Partnerships: Number of collaborative partnerships established with other environmental organizations and incentive platforms.

questions.query: What is the intended direct impact your project will have on the ecosystem?
questions.explanation: DeCleanup Network aims to enhance the ecosystem by integrating environmental conservation efforts with blockchain technology. This project will incentivize community participation in cleanups, resulting in measurable environmental improvements. The dynamic NFTs and digital rewards will drive engagement and activity on the blockchain, showcasing the practical applications of blockchain technology for social good. By fostering a global network of environmentally conscious individuals and organizations, DeCleanup Network will promote sustainability, community collaboration, and increased usage of the blockchain ecosystem for impactful initiatives.

questions.query: What is the long-term impact of your grant?
questions.explanation: DeCleanup Network aims to create a lasting positive impact by fostering a global culture of environmental responsibility and stewardship. By continuously incentivizing cleanup efforts through blockchain technology, the project will drive sustained community engagement and environmental improvement. The integration of dynamic NFTs and digital rewards will showcase the potential of blockchain for social good, encouraging more innovative uses of the technology. Ultimately, DeCleanup Network seeks to build a worldwide community of environmentally conscious individuals and organizations, leading to a cleaner, healthier planet and a more engaged, proactive global citizenry.

questions.query: How will the grant funds be used?
questions.explanation:
The grant funds will be used strategically to enhance the growth and impact of DeCleanup Network:

1. Technology Development: Improve and expand the blockchain infrastructure, including the development of dynamic NFTs, smart contracts, and advanced verification systems.
2. Community Activation: Onboard and support more communities, NGOs, and startups worldwide, facilitating their participation in environmental cleanups.
3. Marketing and Outreach: Implement comprehensive marketing campaigns to raise awareness, drive engagement, and attract more users to the platform.
4. Operational Support: Cover operational logistics, including team expansion, development resources, and administrative expenses.
5. Platform Expansion: Launch DeCleanup Network 2.0, introducing new features and expanding the platform’s capabilities to foster greater environmental impact and community involvement.

questions.query: How will receiving a grant enable you to foster growth or innovation within the ecosystem?
questions.explanation:
Receiving the grant will enable DeCleanup Network to expand and enhance its platform, driving significant growth and innovation within the ecosystem. Specifically, the grant will:

1. Scale Community Activation: Allow us to onboard more communities and organizations globally, increasing participation in environmental cleanups.
2. Enhance Technology: Improve and develop advanced verification systems, including machine learning and image recognition, to ensure accurate and reliable proof of cleanups.
3. Boost Marketing Efforts: Fund comprehensive marketing campaigns to raise awareness, drive engagement, and encourage participation.
4. Develop New Features: Support the launch of DeCleanup Network 2.0, introducing innovative features and expanding the platform’s capabilities.
5. Foster Collaboration: Strengthen partnerships with other environmental and blockchain initiatives, enhancing the overall impact and reach of the ecosystem.

Official Launch
data.description:
[DeCleanup.net](https://decleanup.net) is officially LIVE, and you're welcome to upload your cleanup photos and claim your first reward. Keep cleaning up and submitting photos to level up!

We’ve prepared a detailed User Guide, available on [Mirror.xyz](https://mirror.xyz).

Enjoy participating, and don’t forget to share your feedback and comments in our Telegram group or on the X announcement post.

![newbie](https://beige-defiant-spoonbill-537.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmesjbXbHFezF2TifiZ7cmba8bmPPFgFebQ1pKH9sufChq)

Here is the art for the first level - Newbie, that include three sub levels, each representing one cleanup done.
The art on this level depicts children engaged in cleanup activities, with the design evolving as you progress. Indicator panels start with one bar at cleanup level 1 and increase to three bars.
The dynamic traits are: 
✨ Impact Value 
✨ DCU Points

![image](https://beige-defiant-spoonbill-537.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmSD5soMTBMJHmfk82GoenDt5BWVtDBWMseJaCaVLebQS1)

Closer look at the rewards after third cleanup:

✨ Impact Value - 3
✨ DCU Points - 30

Gain these by applying with more cleanups and reach 10th step - Guardian LVL 👏

They are main indicators of your onchain rank and will determine your profits on Impact Marketplace

questions.explanation: Yes, in Octant community round and in Asia Round by Pagoda

questions.query: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.
questions.explanation:
DeCleanup Network contributes to the OSS ecosystem by introducing an innovative model that combines real-world environmental impact with decentralized Web3 incentives. Our dApp allows individuals and communities to self-tokenize their cleanup efforts, creating measurable and tradable environmental impact assets.

Specific contributions to the OSS ecosystem include:
- Decentralized proof of impact: We provide an open-source model for submitting and verifying real-world environmental actions using staking-based community validation, creating a trustless system for impact tracking.
- Incentivized environmental action: By tokenizing cleanups into dynamic Impact Products (dIPs), we create a sustainable incentive model that combines DeFi rewards with social impact.
- Community-driven growth: The DeCleanup dApp allows for decentralized governance and reward distribution, reinforcing open-source principles of collective ownership and transparent decision-making.
- Partnership-driven expansion: We’ve established partnerships with ReFi DAO, GreenPill Network, Aqua Purge Web3, and other environmental organizations, promoting cross-project collaboration and building a unified Web3 impact ecosystem.
- Open-source codebase: Our backend (Express.js), frontend (Next.js), and smart contracts (Solidity) are open-source, allowing developers to contribute and improve the platform.

questions.query: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?
questions.explanation:
DeCleanup Network stands out from other environmental or social impact platforms due to its decentralized, incentive-driven model and dynamic, gamified structure:

- Proof of Impact (PoI) Verification:
Users submit geotagged before/after photos of cleanup efforts through the dApp.
Submissions are verified through a hybrid model: initially team-based, transitioning to community-based staking validation.
- DeCleanup Impact Products:
Dynamic NFTs that reflect the user’s cleanup history and impact level.
Soulbound and non-transferable, reinforcing proof-of-ownership and authenticity.
Metadata evolves based on cleanup frequency, increasing Impact Value and reward potential.
- Tokenized Incentives:
Earn $DCU for verified cleanups and referrals.
Convert $DCU 1:1 into $DCU tokens at TGE.
Streak-based rewards and bonus multipliers for consistent participation.
- Impact Circles (Collaborative Cleanups): next editions
Multiple users contribute to a shared cleanup goal.
Optional aligned token reward pools (e.g., $USDGLO) provide additional incentives.
Recognizes campaign leaders and distributes shared rewards based on impact value.
- Community Governance and Staking (next editions):
Staking $DCU tokens grants access to governance roles and higher reward tiers.
Validators stake tokens to vote on Proof of Impact verification.
Slashing mechanisms ensure accountability and prevent fraud.
Regen Bazaar Integration (next editions):
Impact Products can be staked on Regen Bazaar to earn additional $REBAZ tokens.
Introduces a DeFi-powered sustainability economy where environmental contributions generate financial value.
How It’s Differentiated:
- First platform to tokenize environmental cleanup efforts using decentralized governance.
- Combines social impact, gamification, and DeFi incentives in a single model.
- Transparent and community-driven reward distribution model.
- Real-world environmental action backed by on-chain verification and asset evolution.

questions.query: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?
questions.explanation:
Our development roadmap is focused on expanding the network, enhancing the reward model, and transitioning to full decentralization:

Phase 2 – Expansion and Decentralization (Current Focus):
- Transition to a staking-based decentralized verification system.
- Expand to additional chains: Superchain Eco and Polygon zkEVM.
- Build advanced UX/UI features (e.g., user dashboards, leaderboards, and streak tracking).
- Build Impact Circle mechanics and allow campaign-specific reward pools.
- Introduce reward multipliers for high-impact cleanups.

Phase 3 – Full Decentralization and Cross-Chain Expansion:

- Enable governance where $DCU holders vote on staking APY and Impact Circle funding.
- Develop multi-chain compatibility with other chains, such as Supra, Stellar, and Starknet.
- Issue multi-chain POAPs as proof of environmental contribution across blockchains.
- Establish an ambassador program to drive global adoption and community growth.

Use of Grant Funds:

- Smart Contract Audits: Ensure secure reward distribution and staking.
- Development: Build cross-chain compatibility and advanced reward mechanics.
- Onboarding Incentives: Provide additional rewards for early contributors and validators.
- Community Growth: Fund ambassador program and regional cleanup events.
- Education & Outreach: Promote environmental impact awareness and increase adoption.

questions.query: For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]—for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.
questions.explanation: all our contracts are in development and not deployed yet, except the contract of V1 that didn't fit the requirements as it was built in a way that required admin based transactions and not user-approved mint. so we are changing the whole game and applying with the V2
